TopicTitle: There is a new Kerbonaut in Town

Articles.Content:
Hello Guys. I'm Duarte and I'm new to the Forums. I play KSP for a long long time ago but that doesn't mean I'm good (I've only reached Mun and Minmus). Now I'm looking forwards to reach Duna.

I'm from Portugal but I live in Spain, I love Science and Astronomy. I play a lot of Games and by far this is the best Indie Game I ever played, the second Game after the Fallout Series.

It's a pleasure to meet you all and collaborate with you, Thank you Guys!
Hello Hello and welcome to the forums! I will put a link to my duna rocket soon!
As this member has not visited the forum for nearly 3 years, it is doubtful he/she will see it, Jeb-head-mug kerman.  It was nice of you to offer, though.
